ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.2_0: a number of nuns were bathing naked at a ford in the river Aciravatī together with prostitutes.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.4_0: “Venerables, why practice the spiritual life when you’re still young? Why not enjoy worldly pleasures?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.5_0: When you’re old, then you can practice the spiritual life.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.6_0: In this way you’ll get the benefit of both.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.8_0: They then went to the nuns’ dwelling place and told the nuns what had happened.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.11_0: who gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.12_0: “Well then, monks, I will lay down a training rule for the following ten reasons:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.13_0: for the well-being of the Sangha, for the comfort of the Sangha, for the restraint of bad people, for the ease of well-behaved monks, for the restraint of corruptions relating to the present life, for the restraint of corruptions relating to future lives, to give rise to confidence in those without it, to increase the confidence of those who have it,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.15_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.16.1_0: ‘If a nun bathes naked, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.6_0: if she bathes without wearing a sarong or an upper robe, then for the effort there is an act of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.7_0: At the end of the bath, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.2_0: if her robes have been stolen or destroyed;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.3_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.2.6_0: The first rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
